entries.femaleVariant: Voodoos were blowin' smoke.
Soon as you gave 'em access to the NetWatch web, they roasted all the agents. And you.
Then why's my brain not liquid?
Biochip swoop in to save the day again?
Then why's my brain not a pile of hot goo?
Dunno – you finally grew a pair? Toughed it out?
You think the Voodoos freed Brigitte?
Biochip swoop in again to save the day? Placide wouldn't've seen that comin'.
Could be. In which case, you're welcome.
Not about to let this lie.
Think the Voodoos freed Brigitte?
After the Voodoos turned you into a fuckin' kamikaze drone.
Not about to let this shit lie.
Christ, hope not. Fuckin' cultists made you their kamikaze bitch.
Grumpy motherfucker… hope he likes surprises.
Bryce Mosley, NetWatch special agent. Can we talk?
Hear me, V? Don't struggle! Got the meds? Do you?
What de fuck, V? You are off-net. I lose your eyes.
Brigitte and the other guy – are they back?
Who told…?
Yes, Maman B is awake.
And what of NetWatch?
Perfect. 'Cause I gotta talk to her.
Taken care of.
Look for my people out front.
The netpig was right.
Seems that was their plan. Worked thanks to you, I'd say.
Invade him. We need access to their data. Clear?
Not here to talk.
Then let's hear it.
All right, what're you offerin'?
All right, let's hear your offer.
Brigitte and the other one, Neptune – what's their condition?
Tags're active. So the VDBs must be keeping them alive from their side.
But they can't sustain that forever…
They cannot. Which in turn makes Brigitte and Ti less useful to us.
Tried using their interface to breach the Voodoo subnet, but Brigitte proved... stubborn.
Brigitte and the other one – what's their condition?
A compromise. I'll fish the Voodoo virus out of your system. And I'll release both Brigitte and Ti Neptune.
And all you gotta do is let us walk. With our data.
OK, fine.
Thoughts?
[Incapacitate agent] Convo's going nowhere.
OK, do it.
Had a specter on you, didn't you? Saw and heard all you did? You followed his orders?
Clock's flippin' digits.
Not interested. I just need an in with the Voodoo chief.
You tryin' to buy me out?
No idea what the Voodoo Boys are payin' you, but our pockets are deeper.
You tryna buy me out?
Got anything to back that claim? That the Voodoos wanna set me up?
Wanna? They did it already – soon as you handed over your link. Slipped in the specter and a virus.
Asked for proof. 'Sides, I'd know.
That so? Then, please, take a look. Run a system diagnostic.
Care to back that up?
You're bluffing.
You're bluffing. Got your back against the wall, can't budge, no room to dodge the bullet.
I see no reason why both of us shouldn't walk out of here alive.
Oh? Want what's best for me? Altruism now part of the NetWatch mission?
You don't gotta like us to see we're better partners than the Voodoo Boys.
Why not attack the Voodoos head on?
Why map Pacifica? This about Rezo Agwe?
Sure, you might free Brigitte. Can't have much of a convo with her if you're dead.
The data collection – why would you target Pacifica's 'runners?
Why not attack 'em head on? Guessin' you've identified the Voodoo top brass.
That's the job.
This's about Rezo Agwe, isn't it? Can't have an indie net where you aren't welcome to protect and serve, huh?
No such thing as an independent net.
If the Voodoo Boys breach the Blackwall, we'll all be fucked, one way or the other.
So what if we have? See me as a sly assassin, offing them one by one?
Please, don't act like the corps who finance NetWatch don't farm out wet work. Let alone the armies they have at their beck and call.
Armies make too much noise. And the Voodoos are skittish as field mice.
Don't gamble your life on the Boys. They aren't exactly known for their professional integrity.
They've been in Night City, what, fifty years? Yet still they cling to a tribal mentality. Their distrust of outsiders – legendary.
What's your beef with the Voodoos?
What's your beef with the Voodoos?
Any idea how many attacks from behind the Blackwall we neutralized last year?
Want me to guess?
So you don't know. No one in Night City knows, outside of us. And no one wants to know.
People imagine it as a great border wall, a one-time solution to protect humanity forever.
Whereas it's more like a torn-open trash bag taped over a busted window.
And the Voodoo Boys will not stop poking holes in the fuckin' thing.
[Incapacitate agent] Convo's going nowhere.
[Incapacitate agent] Convo's going nowhere.
[Incapacitate agent] Jabber, jabber, you talk too much.
Think I'll just stick to my plan.
I knew we'd have a meetin' of the minds.
Mercenary's leaving. She's joined the team, so… be nice. Don't want any problems.
entries.maleVariant: Mercenary's leaving. He's joined the team, so… be nice, don't want any problems.

entries.femaleVariant: Well, now we can talk in private.
Whoa, hey. Easy…
Didn't come all this way to talk.
entries.maleVariant: I didn't come all this way to talk.

entries.femaleVariant: All right. Then let's hear it.
I was desperate.
Who'd take a job from us spooky-ass Voodoo Boys?
Placide took you for pathetic gutter trash, someone who no one's ever gonna come lookin' for.
So, what? I shoulda spilled the truth?
Came askin' for it. I mean, I was desperate. How the hell else were we gonna reach Alt?
Feels like those words came to you a little too easy.
So, what? I shoulda spilled the truth?
Felt like those words came to you awfully easy.
entries.maleVariant: Felt like those words came to you awful easy.

entries.femaleVariant: Well, you do look like shit right now.
Fuck that. Head back to Batty's. Time we had a heart-to-heart with Placide.
No. We take this to Brigitte. Saved her sorry ass, after all.
Wouldn't mind a quick word with Placide, too. Shouldn't let this lie. Head to Batty's.
But I guess you have your good days.
Gee, thanks.
Think it's time we had a heart-to-heart with our pal Placide. Head to Batty's.
Hah, talkin' as if he was there... He's workin' you – so obvious it hurts.
Can't believe you're fallin' for this shit.
Not interested. Not a money job for me. Just need an in with Maman Brigitte, Voodoo chefin.
She managed to take some bites out of our systems before we secured her.
Little taste of your own medicine?
All stations – mercenary currently on the mall grounds is under my protection.
Oh, almost forgot…
She is now leaving the cinema. I'd better not hear of any problems.
entries.maleVariant: He is now leaving the cinema. I'd better not hear of any problems.

entries.femaleVariant: Good luck. Got a feeling we'll be seeing each other.
Ugh... what happened?
Whaddaya think? Voodoos were blowin' smoke. You got duped.
Might've been NetWatch that flatlined me.
Made you their goddamn kamikaze drone.
Guess that's your reward for lendin' 'em a hand.
Not about to put up with this shit.
Could've been NetWatch that flatlined me. VDBs might not even know I survived.
Right, then Placide's face oughta light up like a Christmas tree when you show up alive.
C'mon, let's head to Batty's and get this shit settled for good.
I'm not about to put up with this shit.
Amen, sister. Let's head to Batty's and get this shit settled for good.
entries.maleVariant: Amen, brother. Let's go to Batty's Hotel and get this shit settled for good.

entries.femaleVariant: [Incapacitate agent] Convo's going nowhere.
Not at all. Consider it a counteroffer.
They'll wake up like nothing ever happened. Not to worry.
Enough of the chatter. Fess up – who are you?
What'd you do?
Just severed the connection to the rest of Pacifica. Gives us a little time.
Brigitte and her lapdog Ti Neptune have been frozen several days now, ever since we shrouded their subnet with ICE.
And you? Well... you were sent here to free them.
Do you know why they didn't tell you everything? 'Cause you're a "ranyon."
That's what they call outsiders brought in for special jobs – floor rags.
When you're no longer needed, they chuck you. A fate for all "ranyons."
You defeated Brigitte? How?
You have Brigitte? And how'd you manage that?
entries.maleVariant: You have Brigitte? Huh, and how'd you manage that?

entries.femaleVariant: When we took the mall, we knew the VDBs'd send 'runners. Ti Neptune breached first – to see what was goin' on.
When we ICEd him, Brigitte dove in after him, used him to shield herself. Tough cookie, that one, but still finds herself stuck.
[Stand] Let's have a word with Placide.
Let's head to Batty's, have a little word with Placide.
A second ago you tried to kill me...
Just a second ago you tried to flatline me. And now you wanna talk?
entries.maleVariant: Just a second ago you tried to flatline me. Heh, and now you wanna talk?

entries.femaleVariant: Flatline? No, just discourage. But it looks like I underestimated you.
Fine.
And...? Nothin' outta place, no trace of--
Do it again. Then cross-check the result against the first.
Identical, right? Mhm, 'cause it's not a real scan, it's a copy.
[Run diagnostic] OK.
[Incapacitate agent] Convo's going nowhere.
[Stand]
Gimme a sec...
Hey, V? You all right?
Gimme a sec...
You looked just like him a sec ago.
Thanks, ahem, wasn't asking...
You must first--
Placide?
Hear me, friend?
Got somethin' on your mind?
I don't play well with corps.
Think I'd rather put my trust in the Voodoo Boys.
Fan of westerns, are you?
Sorry, don't work with corps.
Come on, everyone does. I bet you have, too.
Could verify that right away, actually. But we don't need any distractions, do we?
Placide will not be pleased.
Oh, Placide is gonna be pissed…
So he was behind this. Not altogether surprising, I suppose. And none too subtle.
You guys know each other? 'Runner world's a small one, I guess.
Well we're doing whatever we can to make it even smaller.
Fan of westerns, huh?
Of course.
They depict a simpler, better time.
One thing hasn't changed, though. Good guys still carry badges.
Righteous sheriff – could be a new ad campaign for you guys.
Ever seen "Unforgiven"? Gene Hackman?
Righteous sheriff – think you mighta found NetWatch's new recruiting slogan.
Now there's an idea. You've clearly got a feel for this.
Ever seen "Unforgiven"? With the Hackman guy?
entries.maleVariant: You ever see "Unforgiven"? With the Hackman guy?

entries.femaleVariant: No, and they didn't have it here.
Give it a shot sometime. A must-watch.
entries.maleVariant: Give it a shot sometime. It's a must-watch.

entries.femaleVariant: Rather put my trust in the VDBs than in you, by a mile.
Hey, I know we're unpopular in your circles.
But whenever there's a real problem, it's NetWatch, not Pacifica's shady hacker cult, that gets the call. See that, right?
Voodoos know black tech better than anyone. So, no, think I prefer their expertise over yours.
Clever, kinda… but the wrong choice. Know why? They never answer the call.
If you're not Pacifica born and bred, you're nothing to them, less than nothing.
You talk too much.
[Take chip]
[Run diagnostic] OK.
[Incapacitate agent] Convo's going nowhere.
[Get up]
[Jack in]
OK, no more fuckin' tangents. Fess up – who are you?
What'd you just do?
Let's go – any deal has to come quick.
Digits flippin' fast on the clock.
Really not my style, this, but time's run out for us, friend.
Last chance. Decide now.
V? Link was dead. Situation under control?
Yep. Jackin' into our friend now.
